Description: Glazed composition shabti of Ptahhotep born of Tasheretker with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an adze and a hoe, the front of the leg-section is inscribed with a column of incised hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: SLAntiq (number still to be ascertained)
